forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 7C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High near 45F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 4C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 39F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 6C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 43F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 39F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional light rain. High 7C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. High 44F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low around 5C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 41F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 8C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 47F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low near 5C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 42F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning tapering to showers and becoming mixed with snow in the afternoon. High 6C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Morning rain followed by a mix of rain and snow showers in the afternoon. High 42F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of snow. Low near 0C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow. Low 32F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. High 3C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 70%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. High 38F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 70%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers early. Breaks in the overcast later. Low -4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers early. Breaks in the overcast later. Low 26F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 36F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 27F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers early will become steadier snow in the afternoon. High 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow showers becoming a steady accumulating snow later on. High 33F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 7-12cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of snow. Low 29F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow during the morning will mix with rain at times during the afternoon. High 3C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow during the morning will mix with rain at times during the afternoon. High 37F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow likely. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow likely. Low 33F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow. High 4C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and snow. High 39F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and snow. Low 1C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
